amendment.description: An amendment numbered 60 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to prohibit funds from being used to implement any of the Administration's climate change executive orders.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds from being used to implement any of the Administration's climate change executive orders.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rosendale amendment (A043) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 222 (Roll no. 556).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rosendale amendment (A043) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 222 (Roll no. 556).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
